t = int(input())
while t > 0:
    n = int(input())
    arr = list(map(int, input().split()))
    count = 0
    for i in range(n - 1):
        count += max(arr[i], arr[i + 1]) - min(arr[i], arr[i + 1]) - 1
    print(count)
    t -= 1

    n = int(input())
    arr = list(map(int, input().split()))
    skip = 0
    for i in range(n - 1):
        s = arr[i]
        e = arr[i + 1]

        skip += e - s - 1
    print(skip)

n = int(input())
for _ in range(n):
    arr = []
    arr1 = []
    a = int(input())
    arr = list(map(int, input().split()))
    i = 0
    j = 0
    for i in range(a - 1):
        j = i + 1
        if arr[i] > arr[j]:
            res = arr[i] - arr[j] - 1
        if arr[j] > arr[i]:
            res = arr[j] - arr[i] - 1
        arr1.append(res)
    print(sum(arr1))

def difference(string1, string2):
    M = 0
    for j in range(string1 - 1):
        differ = abs(string2[j] - string2[j + 1])
        M += differ - 1
    return M

    string1 = int(input())
    string2 = list(map(int, input().split()))
    diff = difference(string1, string2)
    print(diff)

    for j in range(string1 - 1):
        differ = abs(string2[j] - string2[j + 1])
        sum += differ - 1
    return sum

T = int(input())
for i in range(T):
    n = int(input())
    inp = input()
    list1 = inp.split()
    list_int = []
    for i in list1:
        j = int(i)
        list_int.append(j)
    list_diff = []
    for i in range(0, len(list_int) - 1):
        diff = abs(list_int[i + 1] - list_int[i])
        list_diff.append(diff - 1)
    print(sum(list_diff))

    t = int(input())
    l1 = list(map(int, input().split()))
    count = 0
    for i in range(1, t):
        count += abs(l1[i] - l1[i - 1]) - 1
    print(count)

for _ in range(int(input())):
    a = int(input())
    b = list(map(int, input().split()))
    f = 0
    for i in range(a - 1):
        c = b[i]
        d = b[i + 1]
        e = abs(c - d) - 1
        f = f + e
    print(f)

for t in range(int(input())):
    n = int(input())
    l = list(map(int, input().split()))
    c = 0
    for i in range(1, n):
        c = c + abs(l[i] - l[i - 1]) - 1
    print(c)
